title: Locked Screen Offset Options Not Working

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Setting the locked camera mode to any of the three available options has no effect, my champion remains focussed in the middle of my screen. Attached are a couple screenshots of my camera set to "Per-Side Offset".

I've tried unlocking and re-locking, as well as unlocking, moving the camera and re-locking multiple times for each mode, but they all do nothing. I've also tried repairing my League files to no avail.

I know they're coming, so to those thinking "just play with unlocked camera", don't waste your time.

replies.body: i have also been having this same issue for the past week. several times each game. gamebreaking pretty much

Hiya! 

This should be resolved in 6.3, please lemme know if you're still having issues!
Is there a possibility that your "lock screen" button is no longer bound to the y key or whatever key you use for it?
It is still bound to Y, but I've also tried using the lock screen button in the bottom right.
